A Celebration of Fries

Crinkle-cut Fry Facts

Crinkle cut fries may have been invented for two reasons. First the grooves on the fries create more surface are on the fry, so when fried it can become cruncher/crispier than other fries. The second reason is due to their shape the ability to scoop dipping sauces is improved compared to some other fries.
